text: Mount Bintumani is the tallest mountain in Sierra Leone and West Africa. It is approximately tall. It is popular for hikers and climbers to go to the top. It is in the Loma Mountains. If you wanted to hike from Sinekoro village to the top of Mount Bintumani, you would start at above sea level and end at above sea level. it would take 2 full days to climb Mount Bintumani. It would be a hike there and back. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Geography of Sierra Leone Category:Mountains of Africa
title: Mount Bintumani
